item.title: Settlement approved for New Orleans Archdiocese to pay hundreds of abuse victims
item.description: A federal judge has approved a federal settlement that will clear the way for the New Orleans Archdiocese to pay at least $230 million to hundreds of ...

item.title: Court clerk who helped with Murdaugh trial pleads guilty to showing sealed exhibits
item.description: Former South Carolina court clerk Becky Hill has pleaded guilty to showing sealed court exhibits to a photographer and lying about it in court

item.title: 12 FBI agents fired for kneeling during racial justice protest sue to get jobs back
item.description: Twelve former FBI agents fired after kneeling during a 2020 racial justice protest in Washington have sued to get their jobs back

item.title: Washington's Mayor Bowser says the city's police chief, Pamela Smith, is stepping down
item.description: Washington D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser says the city's police chief, Pamela Smith, is stepping down

item.title: Mamdani tells immigrant New Yorkers about their right not to comply with ICE
item.description: The New York City mayor-elect posted a video explaining immigrants' right.
